about_the_game:
The HRUMKA crew was travelling through space on a yet another delivery mission. Passing by a bunch of asteroids, their ship suddenly plunged into one. Asteroids have no business having such a big gravity pull, yet here they are stuck on one that has its own atmosphere.
Help the HRUMKA crew to repair their ship and investigate the strange place they landed on.


The ship is equipped with clone printers. Unfortunately, only the green ink tank remained intact after the crash. Find ways to repair the remaining tanks. The clones can help you explore the area and retrieve equipment.




Player and NPC share the same pool of abilities. This is both exciting and scary at the same time, because if you are not quick enough to collect the power gems, your enemies might become too strong to overcome.



Match 4 in a row to create a power up that can clear a whole column, Make a match in the shape of L or T to create a bomb. Once the cloning station gets fixed, you will be able to modify the power ups which clones can get.
Match 5 of a kind to open a door to a secret room.



  • Classic Match-3 gameplay with power ups and challenges
  • Roguelike elements like perma death, unlockable upgrades and abilities that greatly change the mode of play
  • Unlockable turn based game mode (not in the demo)
  • Distinct biomes with different opportunities and hazzards (not in the demo)
detailed_description:
The HRUMKA crew was travelling through space on a yet another delivery mission. Passing by a bunch of asteroids, their ship suddenly plunged into one. Asteroids have no business having such a big gravity pull, yet here they are stuck on one that has its own atmosphere.
Help the HRUMKA crew to repair their ship and investigate the strange place they landed on.


The ship is equipped with clone printers. Unfortunately, only the green ink tank remained intact after the crash. Find ways to repair the remaining tanks. The clones can help you explore the area and retrieve equipment.




Player and NPC share the same pool of abilities. This is both exciting and scary at the same time, because if you are not quick enough to collect the power gems, your enemies might become too strong to overcome.



Match 4 in a row to create a power up that can clear a whole column, Make a match in the shape of L or T to create a bomb. Once the cloning station gets fixed, you will be able to modify the power ups which clones can get.
Match 5 of a kind to open a door to a secret room.



  • Classic Match-3 gameplay with power ups and challenges
  • Roguelike elements like perma death, unlockable upgrades and abilities that greatly change the mode of play
  • Unlockable turn based game mode (not in the demo)
  • Distinct biomes with different opportunities and hazzards (not in the demo)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 LTS
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Hrumka

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A rogue-like battler on a match-3 board. Match gems to attack enemies, avoid damage and gather collectibles. Use your level-up upgrades to become stronger and try different play styles. Be careful though - enemies can also level up!
